name: com.ibicha.youtube-player
description: Allows playing youtube videos in Unity.

samples.description: A basic example that uses an Invidious public instance to play a video.
Fetch video metadata and print them to the console.
Play a 360 video on an equi-angular (cubed) sphere mesh.
Play a 360 video on the skybox with equi-rectangular projection.
Play a video and create the required components from a script.
